David Doermann

PhD

David Doermann

PhD

David Doermann

PhD

SUNY Empire Innovation Professor
Professor
Department Chair
Department of Computer Science and Engineering
School of Engineering and Applied Sciences

Research Topics

Document image understanding; video analysis; pattern recognition; computer vision; media forensics; artificial intelligence

Contact Information

338P Davis Hall

Buffalo NY, 14260-2500

Phone: Department Chair: (716) 645-4730, Faculty Office: (716) 645-1557

doermann@buffalo.edu

Action required! Mendeley is changing its API. In order to keep using Mendeley with BibBase past April 14th, you need to:

  1. renew the authorization for BibBase on Mendeley, and
  2. update the BibBase URL in your page the same way you did when you initially set up this page.
